message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.PL 

The paper proposes a novel Reinforcement Learning algorithm to synthesize policies for a Markov Decision Process (MDP) that satisfies a linear time property. This involves converting the property into a Limit Deterministic Buchi Automaton (LDBA) and constructing a product MDP between the automaton and the original MDP. The paper also discusses the online value iteration method used to calculate the maximum probability of satisfying the given property, which suggests a focus on reinforcement learning and optimization. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.RO (Robotics), cs.SY (Systems and Control), and cs.PL (Programming Languages).
